message: I have a great product for you today, Bob!  It's going to be a real game-changer!  I'm confident you'll be very happy with it.  Ready to make a deal?
I'm not sure about this one. Can you tell me more about the product before I make a decision?

I'm not convinced yet. Can you tell me what makes this product so special?

I'm starting to think you're trying to sell me a lemon. Can you give me a reason why I should trust this one over the previous two?
